property.code: {{velocity}} #set($query = "from doc.object(JobArea.JobAreaClass) as job") #if("$!{request.job}" != "") #set($query = "$query where doc.fullName='JobArea.${request.job}'") #else #set($query = "$query where job.status=2 and job.validation=3") #end #set($jobs = $services.query.xwql($query).execute()) #if("$!{request.job}" == "") {{html wiki="true"}} #foreach($job in $jobs) #set($jobDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($job)) #if("$!{jobDoc.position}" != "") * $jobDoc.position #end #end {{/html}} #else #set($jobDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($jobs)) = $jobDoc.position = **$jobDoc.displayPrettyName("introduction"):** $jobDoc.display("introduction") **$jobDoc.displayPrettyName("responsabilities"):** $jobDoc.display("responsabilities") **$jobDoc.displayPrettyName("requiredCompetences"):** $jobDoc.display("requiredCompetences") **$jobDoc.displayPrettyName("otherSkills"):** $jobDoc.display("otherSkills") **$jobDoc.displayPrettyName("benefits"):** $jobDoc.display("benefits") **$jobDoc.displayPrettyName("companyDescription"):** $jobDoc.display("companyDescription") **$jobDoc.displayPrettyName("otherDetails"):** $jobDoc.display("otherDetails") #if("$!{request.step}" == "") {{html}} Apply to this position {{/html}} #else {{include document="RecruitmentApp.NewCandidateSheet"/}} #end #end {{/velocity}}
